title: Running a local testnet with a custom chain
body:
We are trying to figure out how to run a local testnet with a custom chain (not dev). But we encountered that after some time after starting (in a few hours) the nodes stop producing blocks. 

Maybe someone can help find the cause or suggest what is wrong with the startup configuration, etc.

In the logs, unfortunately, quite little information about the possible causes. Here are the errors we were able to find:

![errors-1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30728017/167149184-0b61d017-6612-4597-bff7-757d3aa90ee5.png)
![errors-2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30728017/167149234-08bb6ac4-71b5-4f51-80a3-38d79b7a57cd.png)
![errors-3](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30728017/167149246-1a1eca0d-b617-43c7-becb-a646e215c71a.png)

We are running three nodes using docker-compose on three VPS. It is also worth mentioning that we use Clique consensus. 

### Statup commands:

Node-1:
```
erigon --chain dfiance-devnet --v5disc --datadir /opt/app/data --private.api.addr=localhost:9090 --port=30303 --mine --miner.etherbase=0xb64b22f2227f62043330fe5c23ace1812aac91a2 --miner.sigfile=/opt/app/sigkey.key --nodekey=/opt/app/nodekey.key --verbosity=5 --syncmode=full --prune=disabled --nat=none  --http --http.corsdomain "*" --http.api=eth,erigon,web3,net,debug,trace,txpool --staticpeers=enode://a8b2ec379674125ee3db618a9890d80fa631ecbb8e6a3adf99362670fc5cd6662c02bebe003bd252599989c77b322a24fd8edae02d57e5aa9aa1e89277bd9e89@146.190.225.172:30303,enode://7af1b1c3c05e15c717a9c0aa18c4cbe25c73790c23cb876cfa43fde7445c8f25721733e69a2a1b9c5e9dbae17b45180b24ed9405b05e0bd5769d7aa0b5f9276b@146.190.237.83:30303,enode://73661e3ddce01b7b3bdaaf2cc54d6ce7ddce39dbb45114ce6c45f95bee50f784c91a1889ea1a99d97fbc8e4c29b88dc9d942d56a5c48186a1d17f0d79aefc788@146.190.237.85:30303 --nodiscover --http.port 8485 --http.addr 0.0.0.0
```

Node-2:
```
erigon --chain dfiance-devnet --v5disc --datadir /opt/app/data --private.api.addr=localhost:9090 --port=30303 --mine --miner.etherbase=0xc102271a7d0664e66df24ef594d059768c09c901 --miner.sigfile=/opt/app/sigkey.key --nodekey=/opt/app/nodekey.key --verbosity=5 --syncmode=full --prune=disabled --nat=none  --staticpeers=enode://a8b2ec379674125ee3db618a9890d80fa631ecbb8e6a3adf99362670fc5cd6662c02bebe003bd252599989c77b322a24fd8edae02d57e5aa9aa1e89277bd9e89@146.190.225.172:30303,enode://7af1b1c3c05e15c717a9c0aa18c4cbe25c73790c23cb876cfa43fde7445c8f25721733e69a2a1b9c5e9dbae17b45180b24ed9405b05e0bd5769d7aa0b5f9276b@146.190.237.83:30303,enode://73661e3ddce01b7b3bdaaf2cc54d6ce7ddce39dbb45114ce6c45f95bee50f784c91a1889ea1a99d97fbc8e4c29b88dc9d942d56a5c48186a1d17f0d79aefc788@146.190.237.85:30303 --nodiscover --bootnodes=enode://a8b2ec379674125ee3db618a9890d80fa631ecbb8e6a3adf99362670fc5cd6662c02bebe003bd252599989c77b322a24fd8edae02d57e5aa9aa1e89277bd9e89@146.190.225.172:30303
```

Node-3:
```
erigon --chain dfiance-devnet --v5disc --datadir /opt/app/data --private.api.addr=localhost:9090 --port=30303 --mine --miner.etherbase=0x85e1961e74fb1b64ae7cce37bb44b8088e926acd --miner.sigfile=/opt/app/sigkey.key --nodekey=/opt/app/nodekey.key --verbosity=5 --syncmode=full --prune=disabled --nat=none  --staticpeers=enode://a8b2ec379674125ee3db618a9890d80fa631ecbb8e6a3adf99362670fc5cd6662c02bebe003bd252599989c77b322a24fd8edae02d57e5aa9aa1e89277bd9e89@146.190.225.172:30303,enode://7af1b1c3c05e15c717a9c0aa18c4cbe25c73790c23cb876cfa43fde7445c8f25721733e69a2a1b9c5e9dbae17b45180b24ed9405b05e0bd5769d7aa0b5f9276b@146.190.237.83:30303,enode://73661e3ddce01b7b3bdaaf2cc54d6ce7ddce39dbb45114ce6c45f95bee50f784c91a1889ea1a99d97fbc8e4c29b88dc9d942d56a5c48186a1d17f0d79aefc788@146.190.237.85:30303 --nodiscover  --bootnodes=enode://a8b2ec379674125ee3db618a9890d80fa631ecbb8e6a3adf99362670fc5cd6662c02bebe003bd252599989c77b322a24fd8edae02d57e5aa9aa1e89277bd9e89@146.190.225.172:30303
```
